upper(title) like '%'||upper(#{value})||'%'
upper(content) like '%'||upper(#{value})||'%'
order by freeboardnum desc

select count(*) from freeBoard
upper(title) like '%'||upper(#{value})||'%'

select freeboardnum,email,author,title,content,writeday,readcnt, (select count(*) from remania_comment where category='board' and boardnum = #{freeboardnum}) as replecnt from freeBoard where freeboardnum = #{freeboardnum}
select num,parentComment,boardnum,category,email,author,usercomment,ref,step,comment_level,writeday from remania_comment where boardnum=#{num} and category='board' order by step asc
mapper.insert: insert into remania_comment(num,parentComment,boardnum,category,email,author,usercomment,ref,step,comment_level) values(comment_seq.nextval,comment_seq.currval,#{boardnum},#{category},#{email},#{author},#{usercomment},comment_seq.currval, (select count(*) from remania_comment where category=#{category} and boardnum = #{boardnum})+1,0)
delete from remania_comment where num = ${num} and category = #{category}
mapper.update: update remania_comment set step = step-1 where boardnum = #{boardnum} and step > (select step from remania_comment where num = #{num} and category = #{category})
